com.samsung.spen.lib.image

Class SPenImageFilterConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.spen.lib.image.SPenImageFilterConstants

  • public class SPenImageFilterConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    The constant definition class used to support image effect in the SAMM(Samsung Animated Multimedia Messaging) Library.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.1
